   <script type="text/javascript">
    // Cross browser event handler definition
       var eventMethod = window.addEventListener ? 'addEventListener' : 'attachEvent';
       var messageEvent = eventMethod === 'attachEvent' ? 'onmessage' : 'message';
       var eventer = window[eventMethod];
 
       // Callback to be executed when event is fired
       function receiveMessage(event) {
         function eventDataContains(str) {
           return JSON.stringify(event.data).indexOf(str) !== -1;
         }
         if (event && event.data && (eventDataContains('oil_optin_done') || eventDataContains('oil_has_optedin'))) {
           // Do something when event is fired...
         }
       }
 
       // Register event handler
       eventer(messageEvent, receiveMessage, false);
   </script>

   <script>
    /*	Since script loading is dynamic, we take
          a callback function with our loadScript call
          that executes once the script is done downloading/parsing
          on the page.
          https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4609573/javascript-if-else-to-call-another-js-script
          */
         var loadScript = function(src, callbackfn) {
           var newScript = document.createElement("script");
           newScript.type = "text/javascript";
           newScript.setAttribute("async", "true");
           newScript.setAttribute("src", src);
 
           if(newScript.readyState) {
             newScript.onreadystatechange = function() {
               if(/loaded|complete/.test(newScript.readyState)) callbackfn();
             }
           } else {
             newScript.addEventListener("load", callbackfn, false);
           }
 
           document.documentElement.firstChild.appendChild(newScript);
         }
   </script>
   <!-- END OIL JS --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

     function getSzmCode() {

         return _szmCode['code'];

         return _szmCode['mew'];

a.iphone()||a.ipod()||a.ipad()},a.iphone=function(){return!a.windows()&&e("iphone")},a.ipod=function(){return e("ipod")},a.ipad=function(){return a.windows()&&e("touch")&&!a.windowsPhone()},a.fxos=function(){return(e("(mobile;")||e("(tablet;"))&&e("; rv:")},a.fxosPhone=function(){return a.fxos()&&e("mobile")},a.fxosTablet=function(){return a.fxos()&&e("tablet")},a.meego=function(){return e("meego")},a.cordova=function(){return window.cordova&&"file:"===location.protocol},a.nodeWebkit=function(){return"object"==typeof window.process},a.mobile=function(){return a.androidPhone()||a.iphone()||a.ipod()||a.windowsPhone()||a.blackberryPhone()||a.fxosPhone()||a.meego()},a.tablet=function(){return a.ipad()||a.androidTablet()||a.blackberryTablet()||a.windowsTablet()||a.fxosTablet()},a.desktop=function(){return!a.tablet()&&!a.mobile()},a.television=function(){var a;for(television=["googletv","viera","smarttv","internet.tv","netcast","nettv","appletv","boxee","kylo","roku","dlnadoc","roku","pov_tv","hbbtv","ce-html"],a=0;a<television.length;){if(e(television[a]))return!0;a++}return!1},a.portrait=function(){return window.innerHeight/window.innerWidth>1},a.landscape=function(){return window.innerHeight/window.innerWidth<1},a.noConflict=function(){return mobile"):a.windows()?c(a.windowsTablet()?"windows tablet":a.windowsPhone()?"windows mobile":"desktop"):a.fxos()?c(a.fxosTablet()?"fxos tablet":"fxos mobile"):a.meego()?c("meego mobile"):a.nodeWebkit()?c("node-webkit"):a.television()?c("television"):a.desktop()&&c("desktop"),a.cordova()&&c("cordova"),f=function(){a.landscape()?(i("portrait"),c("landscape")):(i("landscape"),c("portrait"))},h=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(window,"onorientationchange")?"orientationchange":"resize",window.addEventListener?window.addEventListener(h,f,!1):window.attachEvent?window.attachEvent(h,f):window[h]=f,f(),"function"==typeof define&&"object"==typeof define.amd&&define.amd?define(function(){return a}):"undefined"!=typeof module&&module.exports?module.exports=a:window.device=a}).call(this);
 
     adsc_mode       = 'infinite'; //old: "";
     adsc_keyword    = "";
 
     if( typeof adsc_ucp == 'undefined' ){
       adsc_ucp = "0";
     }
 
     
 
     // AdUnits logic (NETMOMSWEB-2327)
     var adunits = document.location.pathname.split('/').filter(function(item) { return item !== ''; });
 
     adsc_adunit1    = 'NetMoms'; // always
     adsc_adunit3    = '';
     adsc_adunit4    = '';
     adsc_adunit5    = '';
 
     if ( adunits.length === 0 ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'startseite';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'video' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'video';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'nachrichten' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'nachrichten';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'tipps' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'tipps';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'unternehmen' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'sonstiges';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'aktionen' || adunits[0] === 'produkte-testen' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'aktionen';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'shopping') {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'shopping';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'magazin' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       if ( adunits.length === 1 ) adsc_adunit2 = adunits[0] // magazin-startpage
       else {
         adsc_adunit2 = adunits[1] || ''; // channel
         adsc_adunit3    = adunits[2] || ''; // subchannel
         adsc_adunit4    = adunits[3] || ''; // subsubchannel
       }
     }
     if (0) {
         adsc_adunit2 = '';
     }
     adsc_mobile = device.mobile() || device.tablet();
     try {
         if (typeof adsc_device == 'undefined') {
 
             adsc_device = 'desktop';
             if (device.tablet()) {
                 adsc_device = 'tablet';
             } else if (device.mobile()) {
                 adsc_device = 'smartphone';
             }
         }
     } catch (e) {
         console.log(e);
         adsc_device = 'desktop';
     }
 
 // Ad events
     const onAdReceived = function(e) {
         var detail = e.detail,
             adContainer = document.getElementById(detail.container),
             adContainerParent = adContainer.parentNode;
 			adLabel = adContainer.previousElementSibling;
 			//receivedata = JSON.stringify(detail);
 			//console.log("Angaben des Received Event: " + receivedata);
         if (detail.isEmpty) {
             if (detail.container === 'tfm_superbanner1') {
                 document.body.classList.add('bb-empty');
             }
             // hide ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'none';
             }
             // show fallback content if available
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'block';
                 }
             }
         } else {
             // display ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'block';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'block';
             }
 			// display adLabel on left side - therefor we need the creative width
 			if(detail.size && detail.slot != 1) {
 				adContainer.style.lineHeight = 0; // needed to prevent top spaces
 				ad_width = detail.size.split('x');
 				if (ad_width.length != -1 && ad_width[0] >= 300) {
 					adContainerParent.style.width = ad_width[0]+'px'; // width of the creative size
 				} else {
 					adContainerParent.style.maxWidth = "800px";
 					adContainerParent.style.minWidth = "300px";
 				}
 				adContainerParent.style.margin = '0 auto'; //needed for centering the parent
 				adLabel.style.textAlign = 'left'; // needed for adlabel shown on left side
 				adLabel.style.paddingLeft = '3px'; // makes it a bit nicer
 				adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
 			}
 
             // if we can load and hide prev content of slot (fallback content)
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'hide';
                 }
             }
         }
     },
 
     onAdRendered = function(e) {
         var detail = e.detail,
             adContainer = document.getElementById(detail.container),
             adContainerParent = adContainer.parentNode,
             adLabel = adContainer.previousElementSibling;
         if (detail.isFiller) {
             if (detail.container === 'tfm_superbanner1') {
                 document.body.classList.add('bb-empty');
             }
             // hide ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'none';
             }
             // show fallback content if available
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     if (adLabel) {
                         adLabel.style.display = 'block';
                         adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
                     }
                 }
             }
         } else {
             // check if label 'Anzeige' need to be shown
             if (detail.isFiller === true) {
                 // hide label
                 if (adLabel) {
                     adLabel.style.display = 'none';
                     adLabel.classList.add('hide');
                 }
 
                 // hide ad slot
                 if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler') && detail.isFiller === true) {
                     adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
                 }
 
                 // show fallback content if available
                 if (adContainerParent && detail.isFiller === true) {
                     const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                     if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                         adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'block';
                     }
                 }
             } else {
                 // show ad block
                 if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                     adContainerParent.style.display = 'block';
                 } else {
                     adContainer.style.display = 'block';
                 }
                 // hide fallback content
                 if ((adContainerParent && detail.type.indexOf('native') !== -1) || (adContainerParent && detail.type === 'reco')) {
                     const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                     if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')  || adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-filler-no-ad-content') ) {
                         adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'none';
                     }
                 }
                 // label showing/hiding
                 if (detail.type.indexOf('native') !== -1) {
 					if (adLabel) { //is this neccessary??
 						adLabel.style.display = 'none';
 						adLabel.classList.add('hide');
 					}
 				} else {
 					if (adLabel) { //is this neccessary??
 						adLabel.style.display = 'block';
 						adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
 					}
 				}
             }
         }
     };
     window.addEventListener('adReceived',onAdReceived,false);
     window.addEventListener('adRendered',onAdRendered,false);
   </script>

   </script>

         var TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked;
         var adBlockCheck = function (mode) {
             if (mode == 'init') {
                 TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = true
                 $('#adenginepixel').load(function () {
                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = false
                 })
             } else if (mode == 'head' || mode == 'body') {
                 TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = true
                 if (typeof TfmediaExtFolEngineLoaded != 'undefined' && TfmediaExtFolEngineLoaded) {
                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = false
                 }
             } else if (mode == 'doconloaded') {
                 if ($('#adenginepixel').complete) {
                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = false
                 } else {
                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = true
                 }
 
             }
         };
         /* dataLayer push: */
         try {
             adBlockCheck('head')
         } catch (oError) {/*ignore*/

         /* You may give each page an identifying name, server, and channel on
          the next lines. */
         var nm_pageName = window.location.pathname
         try {
             // +1 since we cutoff first '/'
             if (nm_pageName.length > 101) {
                 nm_pageName = nm_pageName.substring(1, 88) + '...' + nm_pageName.substring(nm_pageName.length - 10, nm_pageName.length)
             } else {
                 nm_pageName = nm_pageName.substring(1, nm_pageName.length)
             }
         } catch (e) {
             console.error(e)
             nm_pageName = window.location.pathname.substring(1, window.location.pathname.length)
         }
         if (nm_pageName == '') {
             nm_pageName = 'homepage'
         }
         var parts = window.location.pathname.split('/')
         parts.reverse()
         parts.pop()// first element is empty
 
         dataLayerParams.pageName = nm_pageName
         dataLayerParams.pageLevel1 = parts.length > 0 ? parts.pop() : ''
         /* 1. element in URL structure - split from s.pageName */

    <span class="nm-svgSprite">

     <section class="box">
      <div class="cite">
       <div class="row text-center">
        <h2 class="cite__title text-center">
         Das gefällt uns
        </h2>
        <p class="cite__text">
         Die Mutter ist ein Glück für jeden in seiner Not. Wer eine Mutter hat, der hat eine Beschützerin, und ohne Beschützerin ist, wer sie nicht hat.
        </p>
        <span class="cite__author">
         Mahābhārata
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>

        <div class="box">
         <h2 class="text-center">
          Mehr Themen auf NetMoms
         </h2>
        </div>
        <div class="nm-seoblock">
         <ul class="medium-block-grid-2">
          <li>
           <h3>
            Kinderwunsch
           </h3>
           <a data-event-category="engagement" data-event-label="guesthome_teaserSEO" href="https://www.netmoms.de/magazin/kinderwunsch/schwanger-werden/zyklusrechner/">
            Zyklusrechner
           </a>
           ,
           <a data-event-category="engagement" data-event-label="guesthome_teaserSEO" href="https://www.netmoms.de/magazin/kinderwunsch/schwanger-werden/die-10-haeufigsten-irrtuemer-zum-schwangerwerden/">
            Irrtümer zum Schwanger werden
           </a>
           ,
           <a data-event-category="engagement" data-event-label="guesthome_teaserSEO" href="https://www.netmoms.de/magazin/kinderwunsch/pflegekind/voraussetzungen-und-bewerbungsverfahren-fuer-ein-pflegekind/">
            Voraussetzungen für Pflegekind
           </a>
           ,
           <a data-event-category="engagement" data-event-label="guesthome_teaserSEO" href="https://www.netmoms.de/magazin/kinderwunsch/schwanger-werden/schwangerschaftstest-10-haeufige-fragen/">
            Schwangerschaftstest: Häufige Fragen

            Versorgungsausgleich

          <li>
           <h3>
            Gesundheit

   <script type="text/javascript">
    // Cross browser event handler definition
       var eventMethod = window.addEventListener ? 'addEventListener' : 'attachEvent';
       var messageEvent = eventMethod === 'attachEvent' ? 'onmessage' : 'message';
       var eventer = window[eventMethod];
 
       // Callback to be executed when event is fired
       function receiveMessage(event) {
         function eventDataContains(str) {
           return JSON.stringify(event.data).indexOf(str) !== -1;
         }
         if (event && event.data && (eventDataContains('oil_optin_done') || eventDataContains('oil_has_optedin'))) {
           // Do something when event is fired...
         }
       }
 
       // Register event handler
       eventer(messageEvent, receiveMessage, false);
   </script>

   <script>
    var status = window.AS_OIL.status();

   <script>
    /*	Since script loading is dynamic, we take
          a callback function with our loadScript call
          that executes once the script is done downloading/parsing
          on the page.
          https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4609573/javascript-if-else-to-call-another-js-script
          */
         var loadScript = function(src, callbackfn) {
           var newScript = document.createElement("script");
           newScript.type = "text/javascript";
           newScript.setAttribute("async", "true");
           newScript.setAttribute("src", src);
 
           if(newScript.readyState) {
             newScript.onreadystatechange = function() {
               if(/loaded|complete/.test(newScript.readyState)) callbackfn();
             }
           } else {
             newScript.addEventListener("load", callbackfn, false);
           }
 
           document.documentElement.firstChild.appendChild(newScript);
         }
   </script>
   <!-- END OIL JS --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

     };
     var _view = window.location.pathname.match(/^(\/[^\/]*)/)[0];
     function getSzmCode() {
         var _szmCode = szmCodes[_view] || szmCodes['*'];
         return _szmCode['code'];
     }
     function getSzmMew() {
         var _szmCode = szmCodes[_view] || szmCodes['*'];
         return _szmCode['mew'];
     }
     function getSzmSv() {
         var _szmCode = szmCodes[_view] || szmCodes['*'];
         return _szmCode['sv'] || szmCodes['*']['sv'];
     }
   </script>

     adsc_mode       = 'infinite'; //old: "";
     adsc_keyword    = "";
 
     if( typeof adsc_ucp == 'undefined' ){
       adsc_ucp = "0";
     }
 
     
 
     // AdUnits logic (NETMOMSWEB-2327)
     var adunits = document.location.pathname.split('/').filter(function(item) { return item !== ''; });
 
     adsc_adunit1    = 'NetMoms'; // always
     adsc_adunit3    = '';
     adsc_adunit4    = '';
     adsc_adunit5    = '';
 
     if ( adunits.length === 0 ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'startseite';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'video' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'video';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'nachrichten' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'nachrichten';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'tipps' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'tipps';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'unternehmen' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'sonstiges';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'aktionen' || adunits[0] === 'produkte-testen' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'aktionen';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'shopping') {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'shopping';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'magazin' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       if ( adunits.length === 1 ) adsc_adunit2 = adunits[0] // magazin-startpage
       else {
         adsc_adunit2 = adunits[1] || ''; // channel
         adsc_adunit3    = adunits[2] || ''; // subchannel
         adsc_adunit4    = adunits[3] || ''; // subsubchannel
       }
     }
     if (0) {
         adsc_adunit2 = '';
     }
     adsc_mobile = device.mobile() || device.tablet();
     try {
         if (typeof adsc_device == 'undefined') {
 
             adsc_device = 'desktop';
             if (device.tablet()) {
                 adsc_device = 'tablet';
             } else if (device.mobile()) {
                 adsc_device = 'smartphone';
             }
         }
     } catch (e) {
         console.log(e);
         adsc_device = 'desktop';
     }
 
 // Ad events
     const onAdReceived = function(e) {
         var detail = e.detail,
             adContainer = document.getElementById(detail.container),
             adContainerParent = adContainer.parentNode;
 			adLabel = adContainer.previousElementSibling;
 			//receivedata = JSON.stringify(detail);
 			//console.log("Angaben des Received Event: " + receivedata);
         if (detail.isEmpty) {
             if (detail.container === 'tfm_superbanner1') {
                 document.body.classList.add('bb-empty');
             }
             // hide ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'none';
             }
             // show fallback content if available
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'block';
                 }
             }
         } else {
             // display ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'block';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'block';
             }
 			// display adLabel on left side - therefor we need the creative width
 			if(detail.size && detail.slot != 1) {
 				adContainer.style.lineHeight = 0; // needed to prevent top spaces
 				ad_width = detail.size.split('x');
 				if (ad_width.length != -1 && ad_width[0] >= 300) {
 					adContainerParent.style.width = ad_width[0]+'px'; // width of the creative size
 				} else {
 					adContainerParent.style.maxWidth = "800px";
 					adContainerParent.style.minWidth = "300px";
 				}
 				adContainerParent.style.margin = '0 auto'; //needed for centering the parent
 				adLabel.style.textAlign = 'left'; // needed for adlabel shown on left side
 				adLabel.style.paddingLeft = '3px'; // makes it a bit nicer
 				adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
 			}
 
             // if we can load and hide prev content of slot (fallback content)
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'hide';
                 }
             }
         }
     },
 
     onAdRendered = function(e) {
         var detail = e.detail,
             adContainer = document.getElementById(detail.container),
             adContainerParent = adContainer.parentNode,
             adLabel = adContainer.previousElementSibling;
         if (detail.isFiller) {
             if (detail.container === 'tfm_superbanner1') {
                 document.body.classList.add('bb-empty');
             }
             // hide ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'none';
             }
             // show fallback content if available
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     if (adLabel) {
                         adLabel.style.display = 'block';
                         adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
                     }
                 }
             }
         } else {
             // check if label 'Anzeige' need to be shown
             if (detail.isFiller === true) {
                 // hide label
                 if (adLabel) {
                     adLabel.style.display = 'none';
                     adLabel.classList.add('hide');
                 }
 
                 // hide ad slot
                 if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler') && detail.isFiller === true) {
                     adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
                 }
 
                 // show fallback content if available
                 if (adContainerParent && detail.isFiller === true) {
                     const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                     if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                         adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'block';
                     }
                 }
             } else {
                 // show ad block
                 if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                     adContainerParent.style.display = 'block';
                 } else {
                     adContainer.style.display = 'block';
                 }
                 // hide fallback content
                 if ((adContainerParent && detail.type.indexOf('native') !== -1) || (adContainerParent && detail.type === 'reco')) {
                     const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                     if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')  || adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-filler-no-ad-content') ) {
                         adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'none';
                     }
                 }
                 // label showing/hiding
                 if (detail.type.indexOf('native') !== -1) {
 					if (adLabel) { //is this neccessary??
 						adLabel.style.display = 'none';
 						adLabel.classList.add('hide');
 					}
 				} else {
 					if (adLabel) { //is this neccessary??
 						adLabel.style.display = 'block';
 						adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
 					}
 				}
             }
         }
     };
     window.addEventListener('adReceived',onAdReceived,false);
     window.addEventListener('adRendered',onAdRendered,false);
   </script>

             if (mode == 'init') {

                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = false
                 })

                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = false

                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = false
                 } else {

        <path d="M90 43.841c0 24.213-19.779 43.841-44.182 43.841a44.256 44.256 0 0 1-21.357-5.455L0 90l7.975-23.522a43.38 43.38 0 0 1-6.34-22.637C1.635 19.628 21.416 0 45.818 0 70.223 0 90 19.628 90 43.841zM45.818 6.982c-20.484 0-37.146 16.535-37.146 36.859 0 8.065 2.629 15.534 7.076 21.61L11.107 79.14l14.275-4.537A37.122 37.122 0 0 0 45.819 80.7c20.481 0 37.146-16.533 37.146-36.857S66.301 6.982 45.818 6.982zm22.311 46.956c-.273-.447-.994-.717-2.076-1.254-1.084-.537-6.41-3.138-7.4-3.495-.993-.358-1.717-.538-2.438.537-.721 1.076-2.797 3.495-3.43 4.212-.632.719-1.263.809-2.347.271-1.082-.537-4.571-1.673-8.708-5.333-3.219-2.848-5.393-6.364-6.025-7.441-.631-1.075-.066-1.656.475-2.191.488-.482 1.084-1.255 1.625-1.882.543-.628.723-1.075 1.082-1.793.363-.717.182-1.344-.09-1.883-.27-.537-2.438-5.825-3.34-7.977-.902-2.15-1.803-1.792-2.436-1.792-.631 0-1.354-.09-2.076-.09s-1.896.269-2.889 1.344c-.992 1.076-3.789 3.676-3.789 8.963 0 5.288 3.879 10.397 4.422 11.113.541.716 7.49 11.92 18.5 16.223C58.2 65.771 58.2 64.336 60.186 64.156c1.984-.179 6.406-2.599 7.312-5.107.9-2.512.9-4.663.631-5.111z">

     </span>

     <section class="box">
      <div class="cite">
       <div class="row text-center">
        <h2 class="cite__title text-center">
         Das gefällt uns
        </h2>
        <p class="cite__text">
         Die Mutter ist ein Glück für jeden in seiner Not. Wer eine Mutter hat, der hat eine Beschützerin, und ohne Beschützerin ist, wer sie nicht hat.
        </p>
        <span class="cite__author">
         Mahābhārata
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>

          </span>
         </span>
         <span class="show-for-sr">
          Liebe
         </span>
         aus Köln
        </p>

   <script id="oil-configuration" type="application/configuration">
    {
       "advanced_settings": true,
       "timeout": "0",
       "poi_activate_poi": true,
       "poi_group_name": "burdaForward",
       "poi_hub_origin": "//a.bf-tools.net/cmp",
       "poi_hub_path": "/hub.html",
       "locale": "bf",
       "publicPath": "https://a.bf-tools.net/cmp/",
       "privacy_page_url": "https://www.netmoms.de/unternehmen/datenschutz/"
     }
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    // Cross browser event handler definition
       var eventMethod = window.addEventListener ? 'addEventListener' : 'attachEvent';
       var messageEvent = eventMethod === 'attachEvent' ? 'onmessage' : 'message';
       var eventer = window[eventMethod];
 
       // Callback to be executed when event is fired
       function receiveMessage(event) {
         function eventDataContains(str) {
           return JSON.stringify(event.data).indexOf(str) !== -1;
         }
         if (event && event.data && (eventDataContains('oil_optin_done') || eventDataContains('oil_has_optedin'))) {
           // Do something when event is fired...
         }
       }
 
       // Register event handler
       eventer(messageEvent, receiveMessage, false);
   </script>
   <script>

   <script>

   <script>
    /*	Since script loading is dynamic, we take
          a callback function with our loadScript call
          that executes once the script is done downloading/parsing
          on the page.
          https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4609573/javascript-if-else-to-call-another-js-script
          */
         var loadScript = function(src, callbackfn) {
           var newScript = document.createElement("script");
           newScript.type = "text/javascript";
           newScript.setAttribute("async", "true");
           newScript.setAttribute("src", src);
 
           if(newScript.readyState) {
             newScript.onreadystatechange = function() {
               if(/loaded|complete/.test(newScript.readyState)) callbackfn();
             }
           } else {
             newScript.addEventListener("load", callbackfn, false);
           }
 
           document.documentElement.firstChild.appendChild(newScript);
         }
   </script>
   <!-- END OIL JS --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

         "\/chat": {"code": "nm_news_www_1-4-1-2-1-2-2-32", "mew": "nm_news_mew_1-4-1-2-2-2-2-32"},

     };
     var _view = window.location.pathname.match(/^(\/[^\/]*)/)[0];
     function getSzmCode() {
         var _szmCode = szmCodes[_view] || szmCodes['*'];
         return _szmCode['code'];
     }
     function getSzmMew() {
         var _szmCode = szmCodes[_view] || szmCodes['*'];
         return _szmCode['mew'];
     }
     function getSzmSv() {
         var _szmCode = szmCodes[_view] || szmCodes['*'];
         return _szmCode['sv'] || szmCodes['*']['sv'];
     }

   <script>
    /*! device.js 0.2.7 */
     (function(){var a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j;b=window.device,a={},window.device=a,d=window.document.documentElement,j=window.navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase(),a.ios=function(){return a.fxos()&&e("tablet")},a.meego=function(){return e("meego")},a.cordova=function(){return window.cordova&&"file:"===location.protocol},a.nodeWebkit=function(){return"object"==typeof window.process},a.mobile=function(){return a.androidPhone()||a.iphone()||a.ipod()||a.windowsPhone()||a.blackberryPhone()||a.fxosPhone()||a.meego()},a.tablet=function(){return a.ipad()||a.androidTablet()||a.blackberryTablet()||a.windowsTablet()||a.fxosTablet()},a.desktop=function(){return!a.tablet()&&!a.mobile()},a.television=function(){var a;for(television=["googletv","viera","smarttv","internet.tv","netcast","nettv","appletv","boxee","kylo","roku","dlnadoc","roku","pov_tv","hbbtv","ce-html"],a=0;a<television.length;){if(e(television[a]))return!0;a++}return!1},a.portrait=function(){return window.innerHeight/window.innerWidth>1},a.landscape=function(){return window.innerHeight/window.innerWidth<1},a.noConflict=function(){return window.device=b,this},e=function(a){return-1!==j.indexOf(a)},g=function(a){var b;return b=new RegExp(a,"i"),d.className.match(b)},c=function(a){var b=null;g(a)||(b=d.className.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,""),d.className=b+" "+a)},i=function(a){g(a)&&(d.className=d.className.replace(" "+a,""))},a.ios()?a.ipad()?c("ios ipad tablet"):a.iphone()?c("ios iphone mobile"):a.ipod()&&c("ios ipod mobile"):a.android()?c(a.androidTablet()?"android tablet":"android mobile"):a.blackberry()?c(a.blackberryTablet()?"blackberry tablet":"blackberry mobile"):a.windows()?c(a.windowsTablet()?"windows tablet":a.windowsPhone()?"windows mobile":"desktop"):a.fxos()?c(a.fxosTablet()?"fxos tablet":"fxos mobile"):a.meego()?c("meego mobile"):a.nodeWebkit()?c("node-webkit"):a.television()?c("television"):a.desktop()&&c("desktop"),a.cordova()&&c("cordova"),f=function(){a.landscape()?(i("portrait"),c("landscape")):(i("landscape"),c("portrait"))},h=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(window,"onorientationchange")?"orientationchange":"resize",window.addEventListener?window.addEventListener(h,f,!1):window.attachEvent?window.attachEvent(h,f):window[h]=f,f(),"function"==typeof define&&"object"==typeof define.amd&&define.amd?define(function(){return a}):"undefined"!=typeof module&&module.exports?module.exports=a:window.device=a}).call(this);
 
     adsc_mode       = 'infinite'; //old: "";
     adsc_keyword    = "";
 
     if( typeof adsc_ucp == 'undefined' ){
       adsc_ucp = "0";
     }
 
     
 
     // AdUnits logic (NETMOMSWEB-2327)
     var adunits = document.location.pathname.split('/').filter(function(item) { return item !== ''; });
 
     adsc_adunit1    = 'NetMoms'; // always
     adsc_adunit3    = '';
     adsc_adunit4    = '';
     adsc_adunit5    = '';
 
     if ( adunits.length === 0 ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'startseite';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'video' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'video';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'nachrichten' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'nachrichten';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'tipps' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'tipps';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'unternehmen' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'sonstiges';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'aktionen' || adunits[0] === 'produkte-testen' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'aktionen';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'shopping') {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'shopping';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'magazin' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       if ( adunits.length === 1 ) adsc_adunit2 = adunits[0] // magazin-startpage
       else {
         adsc_adunit2 = adunits[1] || ''; // channel
         adsc_adunit3    = adunits[2] || ''; // subchannel
         adsc_adunit4    = adunits[3] || ''; // subsubchannel
       }
     }
     if (0) {
         adsc_adunit2 = '';
     }
     adsc_mobile = device.mobile() || device.tablet();
     try {
         if (typeof adsc_device == 'undefined') {
 
             adsc_device = 'desktop';
             if (device.tablet()) {
                 adsc_device = 'tablet';
             } else if (device.mobile()) {
                 adsc_device = 'smartphone';
             }
         }
     } catch (e) {
         console.log(e);
         adsc_device = 'desktop';
     }
 
 // Ad events
     const onAdReceived = function(e) {
         var detail = e.detail,
             adContainer = document.getElementById(detail.container),
             adContainerParent = adContainer.parentNode;
 			adLabel = adContainer.previousElementSibling;
 			//receivedata = JSON.stringify(detail);
 			//console.log("Angaben des Received Event: " + receivedata);
         if (detail.isEmpty) {
             if (detail.container === 'tfm_superbanner1') {
                 document.body.classList.add('bb-empty');
             }
             // hide ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'none';
             }
             // show fallback content if available
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'block';
                 }
             }
         } else {
             // display ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'block';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'block';
             }
 			// display adLabel on left side - therefor we need the creative width
 			if(detail.size && detail.slot != 1) {
 				adContainer.style.lineHeight = 0; // needed to prevent top spaces
 				ad_width = detail.size.split('x');
 				if (ad_width.length != -1 && ad_width[0] >= 300) {
 					adContainerParent.style.width = ad_width[0]+'px'; // width of the creative size
 				} else {
 					adContainerParent.style.maxWidth = "800px";
 					adContainerParent.style.minWidth = "300px";
 				}
 				adContainerParent.style.margin = '0 auto'; //needed for centering the parent
 				adLabel.style.textAlign = 'left'; // needed for adlabel shown on left side
 				adLabel.style.paddingLeft = '3px'; // makes it a bit nicer
 				adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
 			}
 
             // if we can load and hide prev content of slot (fallback content)
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'hide';
                 }
             }
         }
     },
 
     onAdRendered = function(e) {
         var detail = e.detail,
             adContainer = document.getElementById(detail.container),
             adContainerParent = adContainer.parentNode,
             adLabel = adContainer.previousElementSibling;
         if (detail.isFiller) {
             if (detail.container === 'tfm_superbanner1') {
                 document.body.classList.add('bb-empty');
             }
             // hide ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'none';
             }
             // show fallback content if available
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     if (adLabel) {
                         adLabel.style.display = 'block';
                         adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
                     }
                 }
             }
         } else {
             // check if label 'Anzeige' need to be shown
             if (detail.isFiller === true) {
                 // hide label
                 if (adLabel) {
                     adLabel.style.display = 'none';
                     adLabel.classList.add('hide');
                 }
 
                 // hide ad slot
                 if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler') && detail.isFiller === true) {
                     adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
                 }
 
                 // show fallback content if available
                 if (adContainerParent && detail.isFiller === true) {
                     const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                     if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                         adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'block';
                     }
                 }
             } else {
                 // show ad block
                 if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                     adContainerParent.style.display = 'block';
                 } else {
                     adContainer.style.display = 'block';
                 }
                 // hide fallback content
                 if ((adContainerParent && detail.type.indexOf('native') !== -1) || (adContainerParent && detail.type === 'reco')) {
                     const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                     if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')  || adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-filler-no-ad-content') ) {
                         adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'none';
                     }
                 }
                 // label showing/hiding
                 if (detail.type.indexOf('native') !== -1) {
 					if (adLabel) { //is this neccessary??
 						adLabel.style.display = 'none';
 						adLabel.classList.add('hide');
 					}
 				} else {
 					if (adLabel) { //is this neccessary??
 						adLabel.style.display = 'block';
 						adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
 					}
 				}
             }
         }
     };
     window.addEventListener('adReceived',onAdReceived,false);
     window.addEventListener('adRendered',onAdRendered,false);
   </script>

   </script>

   <script>
    const trackDomains = ["lindtchocoladenclub.de","amzn.to","gutscheine.focus.de","partners.webmasterplan.com","valentins.de","kleinanzeige.focus.de","kuendigen.focus.de","td.oo34.net","x.bestcheck.de","focus.de\/geschenkidee","geschenkidee.de","rabattzwochen.de","prettique.de"];

   <!-- 1. DataLayer Variablen Declaration-->
   <script type="text/javascript">
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
   </script>
   <!-- 2. PageLoad Datalayers -->
   <script type="text/javascript">
    var pageLayoutVariant = 's';
         try {
             switch (adsc_device) {
                 case 'desktop':
                     pageLayoutVariant = 'l';
                     break;
                 case 'tablet':
                     pageLayoutVariant = 'm';
                     break;
                 case 'smartphone':
                     pageLayoutVariant = 's';
                     break
             }
         } catch (e) {
         }
 
         var dataLayerParams = {
                         'pageURL': window.location.href.replace('ampivw.', ''),
             'pageArea': 'netmoms',
             'pageType': 'responsiv',
             'pageLayoutVariant': pageLayoutVariant,
             'pageCountry': 'de',
             'pageLanguage': 'de',
             'analyticsOptOut': false,
             'pageAdUnit2': (typeof adsc_adunit2 != 'undefined' ? adsc_adunit2 : ''),
             'pageAdUnit3': (typeof adsc_adunit3 != 'undefined' ? adsc_adunit3 : ''),
             'pageAdUnit4': (typeof adsc_adunit4 != 'undefined' ? adsc_adunit4 : ''),
             'pageAdUnit5': (typeof adsc_adunit5 != 'undefined' ? adsc_adunit5 : ''),
             'pageAdKeyword': (typeof adsc_keyword != 'undefined' ? adsc_keyword : ''),
             'pageAdUserKeyword': (typeof adsc_userkw != 'undefined' ? adsc_userkw : ''),
             'sessionDate': '180622_d22_cw25_m6_q2_y2018',
             'pageArticleTitle': document.getElementsByTagName('title')[0].text,
             'visitorLoginType': '',
             'pageId': '',
             'userId': '',
             'pageCategory': '',
             'adPartner': '',
             'ageQuestionAge': ''
         }
 
         try {
             dataLayerParams.pageRobots = (document.getElementsByName('robots').length == 1 ? document.getElementsByName('robots')[0].content : 'index,follow')
         } catch (e) {
         }
         console.log(window.location.href);
         /**
          * Tracking adblock
          * See: https://netmoms.jira.com/browse/NETMOMSWEB-387
          */
         var TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked;
         var adBlockCheck = function (mode) {
             if (mode == 'init') {
                 TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = true
                 $('#adenginepixel').load(function () {
                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = false
                 })
             } else if (mode == 'head' || mode == 'body') {
                 TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = true
                 if (typeof TfmediaExtFolEngineLoaded != 'undefined' && TfmediaExtFolEngineLoaded) {
                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = false
                 }
             } else if (mode == 'doconloaded') {
                 if ($('#adenginepixel').complete) {
                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = false
                 } else {
                     TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked = true
                 }
 
             }
         };
         /* dataLayer push: */
         try {
             adBlockCheck('head')
         } catch (oError) {/*ignore*/
         }
         if (typeof TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked != 'undefined' && TftExtFolEngineLoadBlocked) {
             dataLayerParams.adBlock = 'blocked'
         }
 
         /* You may give each page an identifying name, server, and channel on
          the next lines. */
         var nm_pageName = window.location.pathname
         try {
             // +1 since we cutoff first '/'
             if (nm_pageName.length > 101) {
                 nm_pageName = nm_pageName.substring(1, 88) + '...' + nm_pageName.substring(nm_pageName.length - 10, nm_pageName.length)
             } else {
                 nm_pageName = nm_pageName.substring(1, nm_pageName.length)
             }
         } catch (e) {
             console.error(e)
             nm_pageName = window.location.pathname.substring(1, window.location.pathname.length)
         }
         if (nm_pageName == '') {
             nm_pageName = 'homepage'
         }
         var parts = window.location.pathname.split('/')
         parts.reverse()
         parts.pop()// first element is empty
 
         dataLayerParams.pageName = nm_pageName
         dataLayerParams.pageLevel1 = parts.length > 0 ? parts.pop() : ''
         /* 1. element in URL structure - split from s.pageName */
         dataLayerParams.pageLevel2 = parts.length > 0 ? parts.pop() : ''
         /* 2. element in URL structure */
         dataLayerParams.pageLevel3 = parts.length > 0 ? parts.pop() : ''
         /* 3. element in URL structure */
         dataLayerParams.pageLevel4 = parts.length > 0 ? parts.pop() : ''
         /* 3. element in URL structure */
         dataLayerParams.pageLevel5 = parts.length > 0 ? parts.pop() : ''
         /* 3. element in URL structure */
         dataLayerParams.pageQuestionAge = ''
 
         try {
             dataLayerParams.pageIVW_AGOF = iam_data.cp || 'empty'
         } catch (e) {
             dataLayerParams.pageIVW_AGOF = 'nm_news_www_1-1-2-2-1-2-2-5' // fallback to default www
             if (adsc_device == 'smartphone') {
                 dataLayerParams.pageIVW_AGOF = 'nm_news_mew_1-1-2-2-2-2-2-5' // fallback to default www
             }
         }
 
                 dataLayerParams.visitorLoginState = 'anonym'
         dataLayerParams.pastDaysSinceConfirmed = 0

         //var dataLayer = [dataLayerParams]

         dataLayer.push(dataLayerParams);

               Amazon Retouren: Wandern unsere Rücksendungen wirklich in den Müll?

             </div>
            </a>
           </article>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
       </div>
      </aside>
     </section>

     <section class="box">
      <div class="cite">
       <div class="row text-center">
        <h2 class="cite__title text-center">
         Das gefällt uns
        </h2>
        <p class="cite__text">
         Die Mutter ist ein Glück für jeden in seiner Not. Wer eine Mutter hat, der hat eine Beschützerin, und ohne Beschützerin ist, wer sie nicht hat.
        </p>
        <span class="cite__author">
         Mahābhārata
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>

         }
         else if (adsc_device == 'smartphone') {
           TFM.Tag.getAdTag('SMARTPHONE_HOR_QUAD_ANY','tfm_bsad3');
         }
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>

           <a data-event-category="engagement" data-event-label="guesthome_teaserSEO" href="https://www.netmoms.de/magazin/gesundheit/milchzaehne/erste-zaehne-wie-putzt-man-sie/">
            Erste Zähne putzen
           </a>

            Magen-Darm-Infekt
           </a>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    // Cross browser event handler definition
       var eventMethod = window.addEventListener ? 'addEventListener' : 'attachEvent';
       var messageEvent = eventMethod === 'attachEvent' ? 'onmessage' : 'message';
       var eventer = window[eventMethod];
 
       // Callback to be executed when event is fired
       function receiveMessage(event) {
         function eventDataContains(str) {
           return JSON.stringify(event.data).indexOf(str) !== -1;
         }
         if (event && event.data && (eventDataContains('oil_optin_done') || eventDataContains('oil_has_optedin'))) {
           // Do something when event is fired...
         }
       }
 
       // Register event handler
       eventer(messageEvent, receiveMessage, false);
   </script>

   <script>
    /*	Since script loading is dynamic, we take
          a callback function with our loadScript call
          that executes once the script is done downloading/parsing
          on the page.
          https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4609573/javascript-if-else-to-call-another-js-script
          */
         var loadScript = function(src, callbackfn) {
           var newScript = document.createElement("script");
           newScript.type = "text/javascript";
           newScript.setAttribute("async", "true");
           newScript.setAttribute("src", src);
 
           if(newScript.readyState) {
             newScript.onreadystatechange = function() {
               if(/loaded|complete/.test(newScript.readyState)) callbackfn();
             }
           } else {
             newScript.addEventListener("load", callbackfn, false);
           }
 
           document.documentElement.firstChild.appendChild(newScript);
         }
   </script>
   <!-- END OIL JS --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

         "\/spiele": {"code": "nm_news_www_1-4-1-2-1-2-2-12", "mew": "nm_news_mew_1-4-1-2-2-2-2-12"},
         "\/chat": {"code": "nm_news_www_1-4-1-2-1-2-2-32", "mew": "nm_news_mew_1-4-1-2-2-2-2-32"},

     var _view = window.location.pathname.match(/^(\/[^\/]*)/)[0];
     function getSzmCode() {
         var _szmCode = szmCodes[_view] || szmCodes['*'];
         return _szmCode['code'];
     }
     function getSzmMew() {
         var _szmCode = szmCodes[_view] || szmCodes['*'];
         return _szmCode['mew'];
     }
     function getSzmSv() {
         var _szmCode = szmCodes[_view] || szmCodes['*'];
         return _szmCode['sv'] || szmCodes['*']['sv'];
     }

window.process},a.mobile=function(){return a.androidPhone()||a.iphone()||a.ipod()||a.windowsPhone()||a.blackberryPhone()||a.fxosPhone()||a.meego()},a.tablet=function(){return window.device=b,this},e=function(a){return-1!==j.indexOf(a)},g=function(a){var b;return b=new RegExp(a,"i"),d.className.match(b)},c=function(a){var b=null;g(a)||(b=d.className.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,""),d.className=b+" "+a)},i=function(a){g(a)&&(d.className=d.className.replace(" "+a,""))},a.ios()?a.ipad()?c("ios ipad tablet"):a.iphone()?c("ios define&&"object"==typeof define.amd&&define.amd?define(function(){return a}):"undefined"!=typeof module&&module.exports?module.exports=a:window.device=a}).call(this);
 
     adsc_mode       = 'infinite'; //old: "";
     adsc_keyword    = "";
 
     if( typeof adsc_ucp == 'undefined' ){
       adsc_ucp = "0";
     }
 
     
 
     // AdUnits logic (NETMOMSWEB-2327)
     var adunits = document.location.pathname.split('/').filter(function(item) { return item !== ''; });
 
     adsc_adunit1    = 'NetMoms'; // always
     adsc_adunit3    = '';
     adsc_adunit4    = '';
     adsc_adunit5    = '';
 
     if ( adunits.length === 0 ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'startseite';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'video' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'video';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'nachrichten' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'nachrichten';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'tipps' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'tipps';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'unternehmen' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'sonstiges';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'aktionen' || adunits[0] === 'produkte-testen' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'aktionen';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'shopping') {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'shopping';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'magazin' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       if ( adunits.length === 1 ) adsc_adunit2 = adunits[0] // magazin-startpage
       else {
         adsc_adunit2 = adunits[1] || ''; // channel
         adsc_adunit3    = adunits[2] || ''; // subchannel
         adsc_adunit4    = adunits[3] || ''; // subsubchannel
       }
     }
     if (0) {
         adsc_adunit2 = '';
     }
     adsc_mobile = device.mobile() || device.tablet();
     try {
         if (typeof adsc_device == 'undefined') {
 
             adsc_device = 'desktop';
             if (device.tablet()) {
                 adsc_device = 'tablet';
             } else if (device.mobile()) {
                 adsc_device = 'smartphone';
             }
         }
     } catch (e) {
         console.log(e);
         adsc_device = 'desktop';
     }
 
 // Ad events
     const onAdReceived = function(e) {
         var detail = e.detail,
             adContainer = document.getElementById(detail.container),
             adContainerParent = adContainer.parentNode;
 			adLabel = adContainer.previousElementSibling;
 			//receivedata = JSON.stringify(detail);
 			//console.log("Angaben des Received Event: " + receivedata);
         if (detail.isEmpty) {
             if (detail.container === 'tfm_superbanner1') {
                 document.body.classList.add('bb-empty');
             }
             // hide ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'none';
             }
             // show fallback content if available
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'block';
                 }
             }
         } else {
             // display ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'block';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'block';
             }
 			// display adLabel on left side - therefor we need the creative width
 			if(detail.size && detail.slot != 1) {
 				adContainer.style.lineHeight = 0; // needed to prevent top spaces
 				ad_width = detail.size.split('x');
 				if (ad_width.length != -1 && ad_width[0] >= 300) {
 					adContainerParent.style.width = ad_width[0]+'px'; // width of the creative size
 				} else {
 					adContainerParent.style.maxWidth = "800px";
 					adContainerParent.style.minWidth = "300px";
 				}
 				adContainerParent.style.margin = '0 auto'; //needed for centering the parent
 				adLabel.style.textAlign = 'left'; // needed for adlabel shown on left side
 				adLabel.style.paddingLeft = '3px'; // makes it a bit nicer
 				adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
 			}
 
             // if we can load and hide prev content of slot (fallback content)
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'hide';
                 }
             }
         }
     },
 
     onAdRendered = function(e) {
         var detail = e.detail,
             adContainer = document.getElementById(detail.container),
             adContainerParent = adContainer.parentNode,
             adLabel = adContainer.previousElementSibling;
         if (detail.isFiller) {
             if (detail.container === 'tfm_superbanner1') {
                 document.body.classList.add('bb-empty');
             }
             // hide ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'none';
             }
             // show fallback content if available
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     if (adLabel) {
                         adLabel.style.display = 'block';
                         adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
                     }
                 }
             }
         } else {
             // check if label 'Anzeige' need to be shown
             if (detail.isFiller === true) {
                 // hide label
                 if (adLabel) {
                     adLabel.style.display = 'none';
                     adLabel.classList.add('hide');
                 }
 
                 // hide ad slot
                 if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler') && detail.isFiller === true) {
                     adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
                 }
 
                 // show fallback content if available
                 if (adContainerParent && detail.isFiller === true) {
                     const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                     if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                         adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'block';
                     }
                 }
             } else {
                 // show ad block
                 if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                     adContainerParent.style.display = 'block';
                 } else {
                     adContainer.style.display = 'block';
                 }
                 // hide fallback content
                 if ((adContainerParent && detail.type.indexOf('native') !== -1) || (adContainerParent && detail.type === 'reco')) {
                     const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                     if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')  || adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-filler-no-ad-content') ) {
                         adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'none';
                     }
                 }
                 // label showing/hiding
                 if (detail.type.indexOf('native') !== -1) {
 					if (adLabel) { //is this neccessary??
 						adLabel.style.display = 'none';
 						adLabel.classList.add('hide');
 					}
 				} else {
 					if (adLabel) { //is this neccessary??
 						adLabel.style.display = 'block';
 						adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
 					}
 				}
             }
         }
     };
     window.addEventListener('adReceived',onAdReceived,false);
     window.addEventListener('adRendered',onAdRendered,false);
   </script>
   <!-- Please first set the mapping parameter/variables and then load the Container Script END -->

   </script>

        <li>
         <article class="teaser " id="news-teaser-74821">
          <a data-event-category="engagement" data-event-label="guesthome_teaserTop" data-postid="74821" href="https://www.netmoms.de/magazin/kinder/pubertaet/selbstbefriedigung-jugendliche-entdecken-ihren-koerper/">
           <figure class="teaser__figure">
            <amp-img class="teaser__image" data-attribute="image5" height="270" layout="responsive" src="https://netmomsimgmi-a.akamaihd.net/content/uploads/sites/30/2016/02/magazin_kinder_pubertaet_selbstbefriedigung-jugendliche-entdecken-ihren-koerper.jpg" width="480">
            </amp-img>
           </figure>
           <div class="teaser__content">
            <div class="teaser__title">
             Selbstbefriedigung: Jugendliche entdecken ihren Körper
            </div>
           </div>
          </a>
         </article>
        </li>
       </ul>
      </div>

     <section class="box">
      <div class="cite">
       <div class="row text-center">
        <h2 class="cite__title text-center">
         Das gefällt uns
        </h2>
        <p class="cite__text">
         Die Mutter ist ein Glück für jeden in seiner Not. Wer eine Mutter hat, der hat eine Beschützerin, und ohne Beschützerin ist, wer sie nicht hat.
        </p>
        <span class="cite__author">
         Mahābhārata
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
     <section class="row bg-white">
      <div class="container">
       <div class="column">
        <ul class="medium-block-grid-2 large-block-grid-3">
         <li class="teaser teaser-ch">
          <a class="teaser--zoom" data-event-category="engagement" data-event-label="guesthome_teaserChannel" href="/magazin/kinderwunsch/">
           <figure class="teaser__figure">
            <amp-img class="teaser__image" height="270" layout="responsive" src="/content/themes/twentyfifteen/app/dist/img/bg/themes-1.jpg" width="480">
            </amp-img>
           </figure>
           <h3 class="teaser__title">
            Kinderwunsch
           </h3>
          </a>
         </li>
         <li class="teaser teaser-ch ">
          <a class="teaser--zoom" data-event-category="engagement" data-event-label="guesthome_teaserChannel" href="/magazin/schwangerschaft/">
           <figure class="teaser__figure">
            <amp-img class="teaser__image" height="270" layout="responsive" src="/content/themes/twentyfifteen/app/dist/img/bg/themes-2.jpg" width="480">

           <a data-event-category="engagement" data-event-label="guesthome_teaserSEO" href="https://www.netmoms.de/magazin/gesundheit/mutter-kind-kur/mutter-kind-kur-tipps-fuer-den-antrag/">

   <script type="text/javascript">
    // Cross browser event handler definition
       var eventMethod = window.addEventListener ? 'addEventListener' : 'attachEvent';
       var messageEvent = eventMethod === 'attachEvent' ? 'onmessage' : 'message';
       var eventer = window[eventMethod];
 
       // Callback to be executed when event is fired
       function receiveMessage(event) {
         function eventDataContains(str) {
           return JSON.stringify(event.data).indexOf(str) !== -1;
         }
         if (event && event.data && (eventDataContains('oil_optin_done') || eventDataContains('oil_has_optedin'))) {
           // Do something when event is fired...
         }
       }
 
       // Register event handler
       eventer(messageEvent, receiveMessage, false);
   </script>

   <script>
    /*	Since script loading is dynamic, we take
          a callback function with our loadScript call
          that executes once the script is done downloading/parsing
          on the page.
          https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4609573/javascript-if-else-to-call-another-js-script
          */
         var loadScript = function(src, callbackfn) {
           var newScript = document.createElement("script");
           newScript.type = "text/javascript";
           newScript.setAttribute("async", "true");
           newScript.setAttribute("src", src);
 
           if(newScript.readyState) {
             newScript.onreadystatechange = function() {
               if(/loaded|complete/.test(newScript.readyState)) callbackfn();
             }
           } else {
             newScript.addEventListener("load", callbackfn, false);
           }
 
           document.documentElement.firstChild.appendChild(newScript);
         }
   </script>
   <!-- END OIL JS --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

     adsc_mode       = 'infinite'; //old: "";
     adsc_keyword    = "";
 
     if( typeof adsc_ucp == 'undefined' ){
       adsc_ucp = "0";
     }
 
     
 
     // AdUnits logic (NETMOMSWEB-2327)
     var adunits = document.location.pathname.split('/').filter(function(item) { return item !== ''; });
 
     adsc_adunit1    = 'NetMoms'; // always
     adsc_adunit3    = '';
     adsc_adunit4    = '';
     adsc_adunit5    = '';
 
     if ( adunits.length === 0 ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'startseite';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'video' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'video';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'nachrichten' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'nachrichten';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'tipps' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview_full';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'tipps';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'unternehmen' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       adsc_adunit2    = 'sonstiges';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'aktionen' || adunits[0] === 'produkte-testen' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'aktionen';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'shopping') {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       adsc_adunit2    = 'shopping';
     }
     else if ( adunits[0] === 'magazin' ) {
       adsc_layout     = 'overview';
       if ( 0 ) {
          adsc_layout     = 'artikel';
       };
       if ( adunits.length === 1 ) adsc_adunit2 = adunits[0] // magazin-startpage
       else {
         adsc_adunit2 = adunits[1] || ''; // channel
         adsc_adunit3    = adunits[2] || ''; // subchannel
         adsc_adunit4    = adunits[3] || ''; // subsubchannel
       }
     }
     if (0) {
         adsc_adunit2 = '';
     }
     adsc_mobile = device.mobile() || device.tablet();
     try {
         if (typeof adsc_device == 'undefined') {
 
             adsc_device = 'desktop';
             if (device.tablet()) {
                 adsc_device = 'tablet';
             } else if (device.mobile()) {
                 adsc_device = 'smartphone';
             }
         }
     } catch (e) {
         console.log(e);
         adsc_device = 'desktop';
     }
 
 // Ad events
     const onAdReceived = function(e) {
         var detail = e.detail,
             adContainer = document.getElementById(detail.container),
             adContainerParent = adContainer.parentNode;
 			adLabel = adContainer.previousElementSibling;
 			//receivedata = JSON.stringify(detail);
 			//console.log("Angaben des Received Event: " + receivedata);
         if (detail.isEmpty) {
             if (detail.container === 'tfm_superbanner1') {
                 document.body.classList.add('bb-empty');
             }
             // hide ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'none';
             }
             // show fallback content if available
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'block';
                 }
             }
         } else {
             // display ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'block';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'block';
             }
 			// display adLabel on left side - therefor we need the creative width
 			if(detail.size && detail.slot != 1) {
 				adContainer.style.lineHeight = 0; // needed to prevent top spaces
 				ad_width = detail.size.split('x');
 				if (ad_width.length != -1 && ad_width[0] >= 300) {
 					adContainerParent.style.width = ad_width[0]+'px'; // width of the creative size
 				} else {
 					adContainerParent.style.maxWidth = "800px";
 					adContainerParent.style.minWidth = "300px";
 				}
 				adContainerParent.style.margin = '0 auto'; //needed for centering the parent
 				adLabel.style.textAlign = 'left'; // needed for adlabel shown on left side
 				adLabel.style.paddingLeft = '3px'; // makes it a bit nicer
 				adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
 			}
 
             // if we can load and hide prev content of slot (fallback content)
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'hide';
                 }
             }
         }
     },
 
     onAdRendered = function(e) {
         var detail = e.detail,
             adContainer = document.getElementById(detail.container),
             adContainerParent = adContainer.parentNode,
             adLabel = adContainer.previousElementSibling;
         if (detail.isFiller) {
             if (detail.container === 'tfm_superbanner1') {
                 document.body.classList.add('bb-empty');
             }
             // hide ad slot
             if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                 adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
             } else {
                 adContainer.style.display = 'none';
             }
             // show fallback content if available
             if (adContainerParent) {
                 const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                 if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                     if (adLabel) {
                         adLabel.style.display = 'block';
                         adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
                     }
                 }
             }
         } else {
             // check if label 'Anzeige' need to be shown
             if (detail.isFiller === true) {
                 // hide label
                 if (adLabel) {
                     adLabel.style.display = 'none';
                     adLabel.classList.add('hide');
                 }
 
                 // hide ad slot
                 if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler') && detail.isFiller === true) {
                     adContainerParent.style.display = 'none';
                 }
 
                 // show fallback content if available
                 if (adContainerParent && detail.isFiller === true) {
                     const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                     if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')) {
                         adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'block';
                     }
                 }
             } else {
                 // show ad block
                 if (adContainerParent.classList.contains('js-filler')) {
                     adContainerParent.style.display = 'block';
                 } else {
                     adContainer.style.display = 'block';
                 }
                 // hide fallback content
                 if ((adContainerParent && detail.type.indexOf('native') !== -1) || (adContainerParent && detail.type === 'reco')) {
                     const adContainerGrandParent = adContainerParent.parentNode;
                     if (adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-content-or-ad')  || adContainerGrandParent.classList.contains('js-filler-no-ad-content') ) {
                         adContainerParent.nextElementSibling.style.display = 'none';
                     }
                 }
                 // label showing/hiding
                 if (detail.type.indexOf('native') !== -1) {
 					if (adLabel) { //is this neccessary??
 						adLabel.style.display = 'none';
 						adLabel.classList.add('hide');
 					}
 				} else {
 					if (adLabel) { //is this neccessary??
 						adLabel.style.display = 'block';
 						adLabel.classList.remove('hide');
 					}
 				}
             }
         }
     };
     window.addEventListener('adReceived',onAdReceived,false);
     window.addEventListener('adRendered',onAdRendered,false);
   </script>
   <!-- Please first set the mapping parameter/variables and then load the Container Script END -->
   <script data-config='{"jq":true, "ima": true, "stpi": true}' src="/htdocs/content/themes/twentyfifteen/app/scripts/vendor/tfm.videopkg.min.js?v=13042018" type="text/javascript">
   </script>

     <section class="row bg-white pos-rel">
      <div class="large-8 columns">
       <div class="box">
        <article class="teaser teaser--featured " id="news-teaser-73181">
         <a data-event-category="engagement" data-event-label="guesthome_teaserTop" data-postid="73181" href="https://www.netmoms.de/magazin/kinder/erziehung/wenn-dein-vierjaehriges-kind-luegt/">

      </div>
     </section>
     <section class="row">
      <div class="column box">
       <div class="backdrop js-filler">
        <span class="nmAd__label hide">
         Anzeige
        </span>
        <div class="adWrapper" id="tfm_bsad3">
         <script type="text/javascript">
          if (adsc_device == 'desktop') {
           TFM.Tag.getAdTag('DESKTOP_HOR_ANY','tfm_bsad3');
         }
         else if (adsc_device == 'tablet') {
           TFM.Tag.getAdTag('TABLET_HOR_ANY','tfm_bsad3');
         }
         else if (adsc_device == 'smartphone') {
           TFM.Tag.getAdTag('SMARTPHONE_HOR_QUAD_ANY','tfm_bsad3');
         }
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
     <section class="box">
      <div class="cite">
       <div class="row text-center">
        <h2 class="cite__title text-center">
         Das gefällt uns
        </h2>
        <p class="cite__text">
         Die Mutter ist ein Glück für jeden in seiner Not. Wer eine Mutter hat, der hat eine Beschützerin, und ohne Beschützerin ist, wer sie nicht hat.
        </p>
        <span class="cite__author">
         Mahābhārata
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
